title: Huge nerf to tanks. Lets change the only tree that benefits tanks to suit it more for adc's
body:
_"Resolve’s multiplicative scaling for tanks is simply too high across the board. We’re reducing the effectiveness of the class at the mastery level while adding flat-health options for squishies who actually want some defense, even if they’re not stacking it."_

**Veteran's Scars **

HEALTH BONUS:  +4% total health ⇒ +45 health 

What a joke! Reolve Tree is meant for tanks, not squishies. They already have 2 trees that suit them better than tanks. 45 HP is the equivalent of 4% bonus HP at 1125 HP. Lategame with 4000 HP you lose 160-45=115 HP, including the nerf to Deadman's Plate you lose an extra 100 HP. 

**Unyielding **

BONUS ARMOR AND MAGIC RESIST:  6% ⇒ 5% 

They also lose 1% bonus armor+mr

**Bond of Stone** 

DAMAGE REDUCTION WHILE ALONE:  2% ⇒ 3% 

DAMAGE REDUCTION WITH AN ALLY:  8% ⇒ 6% 

ALLY BLOCK TURNS OFF AT:  15% health ⇒ 5% health 

And lose 2% damage reduction in teamfights or when getting help from the jungler in lane.


**TL;DR: **I can live with the change to Bond of Stone because 8% damage reduction was too strong but I can't live with the multiple nerfs tanks received this patch. Losing at least 215 HP, 1% bonus armor/mr and 2% damage reduction is too much for a class that was already getting screwed over bij adc's. At least you could have the 2 masteries coexist. Flat HP for squishies and scaling HP for tanks.

-any form of CC/Damage Tank goes Grasp of the Undying, want to stay fighting more use this one since not only will you most likely survive the 4 seconds necessary to activate it but since it heals off your max health its great for tanks (such as WW, Naut, Malph, etc etc.)
